sys_update_xml.name: sp_widget_1486e8d1db2303008417da11cf961932
sys_update_xml.payload: c.panel-heading { position: relative; aside { position: absolute; right: 15px; top: 8px; input { width: 85px; padding: 0 20px 0 6px; background: transparent; border: none; border-bottom: 1px solid #ccc; -moz-transition: width 0.4s ease-in-out; -webkit-transition: width 0.4s ease-in-out; transition: width 0.4s ease-in-out; &:focus { width: 200px; } } i { position: absolute; right: 15px; top: 3px; pointer-events:none; } } } .sorters { background: #eaf5fc; a { padding: 3px 15px; margin-top: 5px; &.tab-btn { margin-left: 5px; padding: 3px 5px; background: #fff; cursor: pointer; } &.active { border: 1px solid #eaeaea; border-bottom: none; font-weight: bold; } } select { width: auto; @include box-shadow(0); border: 0; background: transparent; margin-left: 5px; display: block; color: #ababab; margin-top: 11px; font-size: 0.7em; } } .panel-body { padding: 0; p { padding: 15px; } } .ticket { padding: 0 15px; border-bottom: 1px solid #eaeaea; &.pulse { -webkit-animation-iteration-count: 3; -moz-animation-iteration-count: 3; animation-iteration-count: 3; background: #fcf8e3; } .item-header { margin-bottom: 3px; margin-top:3px; margin-left: -5px; font-size: .85em; .fa { .fa-circle { color: #9d6818; } &.fa-req .fa-circle { color: #107d8b; } } mark { float: right; } } label { font-size: .8em; text-transform: uppercase; font-weight: 100; border-width: 1px; border-style: solid; color: #333; float: right; margin-top: 2px; margin-right: 10px; border-color: #dacd94; color: #333; &.label-4 {border-color: red; color: #333; } &.label-5 {border-color: pink; color: #333;} &.child {border: none; float: none; margin: 0;} } span.child { font-weight: 100; color: #333; } header { padding: 0 0 10px; small { display: block; font-size: .75em; } > span { font-size: .75em; margin-left: 20px; } footer { font-size: .75em; } } } .pagination { margin: 0; } sp_instancetitle,sys_name,glyph,colorfalsemy-unified-ticketsfalseMy Unified Tickets[{"name":"maximum_entries","label":"Maximum Entries","type":"string"},{"name":"items_per_page","label":"Items per page","type":"string"}]falsefalsesp_widgetadmin2018-01-08 02:02:31true1486e8d1db2303008417da11cf96193211My Unified Ticketsglobalfalseglobalsp_widget_1486e8d1db2303008417da11cf961932admin2018-01-08 20:27:02
